aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.introduction: Hi there! I'm Konkamon Sion, an aspiring Full-Stack Web Developer who recently graduated from Rajamangala University of Technology Srivijaya, where I majored in Information Technology
aboutMe.passion: With 2-3 years of experience focused on Front-end development, I've honed my expertise in Vue, Nuxt, and TailwindCSS. I'm now actively diving into Back-end development, learning Node.js and Nest.js, and exploring automation tools like n8n.

footer.copyrightText: No Right Reserved, It's Open Source!
